DOC.detailed_description: Coronary stent default device treatment coronary artery disease percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) accord exist guideline . However , thrombosis restenosis still main limitation current permanent metallic stent . In contrast Bare Metal Stents ( BMSs ) , Drug Eluting Stents ( DESs ) reduce restenosis rate due presence antiproliferative agent coat layer stent surface reduce rate repeat revascularisation . However , late late stent thrombosis remain limitation DES spite prolong dual antiplatelet therapy.Bioabsorbable scaffold introduce overcome limitation permanent metallic stent . The aim observational registry investigate clinical performance long-term safety Magmaris real world setting .
DOC.criteria: Subject ≥18 year age Subject must willing sign Patient Informed Consent ( PIC ) Patient Data Release Form ( PDRF ) applicable Symptomatic coronary artery disease Target lesion stenosis visual estimation : > 50 % < 100 % TIMI flow ≥1 Subject eligible Dual Anti Platelet Therapy ( DAPT ) Pregnant and/or breast feeding female females intend become pregnant time registry Known allergy : Acetylsalicylic Acid ( ASA ) , clopidogrel , ticlopidine , heparin anticoagulant /antiplatelet require PCI , contrast medium , sirolimus , similar drug ; scaffold material include Magnesium , Yttrium , Neodymium , Zirconium , Gadolinium , Dysprosium , Tantalum adequately premedicated Subjects dialysis
